fields.Name of Venue/Sponsor: Boise City Dept. of Arts & History
fields.Venue / Sponsor Location (City, State, C: The Stein Luminary - Boise State University
fields.Description/Abstract: <p><span style="font-weight:400;">An invited, local presentation of the ArtSci Community’s creative activity and research. Presented alongside Konrad Meister, Ph.D. (Researcher/Professor) at the Stein Luminary in Boise, Idaho. The talk was under a series called,</span><span style="font-weight:400;"> Going Public: Leveraging Cross-Professional Collaboration </span><span style="font-weight:400;">and outlined the collaborative process of and the innovative work developed by the ArtSci Community. (Note: I was paid $500 to create the materials and speak at this venue)</span></p>
